en_title: Warner Bros says Paramount bid superior, Netflix response awaited
cn_title: 華納兄弟稱對派拉蒙報價更優，正等待 Netflix 回應
en_summary: Warner Bros. Discovery has declared its bid for Paramount Global superior to rival offers, shifting the focus to how Netflix will counter in the tightening media consolidation race.
cn_summary: 華納兄弟探索公司宣布其對派拉蒙全球的收購報價優於競爭對手，市場正關注 Netflix 將如何應對這一媒體整合浪潮。

en_title: LiqTech International Reports Fiscal Year 2025 Results
cn_title: LiqTech International 公佈 2025 財年業績
en_summary: Clean technology leader LiqTech specialized in advanced filtration reported its Q4 and full-year results today, showing resilient growth in sustainable industrial solutions.
cn_summary: 清潔技術領導者 LiqTech 今日公佈第四季度及全年業績，顯示其在可持續工業解決方案領域保持穩健增長。

en_title: BNF Bank Goes Live on Temenos Transact Core System
cn_title: BNF Bank 成功上線 Temenos Transact 核心系統
en_summary: Malta-based BNF Bank has completed its core banking transition using Temenos Transact and Validata's ConnectIQ technology to accelerate digital transformation.
cn_summary: 馬耳他 BNF Bank 使用 Temenos Transact 同 Validata 嘅數據技術完成咗核心銀行系統轉型，加速數碼化進程。
